= Demo Activities and Places =
 I'm building the demo as we speak.

== Working Application ==
 * [https://mywalletinventory.appspot.com Wallet Inventory App] - App Demo (keep your phone numbers incase it gets stolen)

== Application Source ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FWalletInventory Main App Source] - Wallet Inventory App source
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FGoneVertical-Core%2Fsrc%2Forg%2Fgonevertical%2Fcore%2Fclient Included Module Source] - Included module source, with the WiseTextBox and a couple other core widgets

= GWT Features Used =
 I think I've used some fun features in this project.  

== Activities ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FWalletInventory%2Fsrc%2Fcom%2Fgonevertical%2Fclient%2Fapp%2Factivity Activities Source]

== Places ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FWalletInventory%2Fsrc%2Fcom%2Fgonevertical%2Fclient%2Fapp%2Factivity%2Fplaces Places Source] 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/client/app/activity/places/WalletEditPlace.java#20 WalletEditPlace.java Source] - Edit Place with url tokenizer
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/client/app/ClientFactoryImpl.java#153 ClientFactoryImpl Source] - use the request factory in your tokenizers!!!

== `RequestFactory` ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FWalletInventory%2Fsrc%2Fcom%2Fgonevertical%2Fclient%2Fapp%2Frequestfactory RequestFactory Source]

== Client Factory ==
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/client/app/ClientFactory.java ClientFactory.java Source] - Interface
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/client/app/ClientFactoryImpl.java ClientFactoryImpl.java Source] - Implementation using deferred binding.

== Google Account == 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/client/views/impl/SignInViewImpl.java#114 SignInViewImpl] - Google Account UserData Use
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/client/views/widgets/LoginWidget.java LoginWidget.java Source] - LoginWidget on the top right of the app 
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/WalletInventory/src/com/gonevertical/server/jdo/UserData.java UserData.java Source] - Using Google User as the auth and tracking of the owner, whos who

== Module Include ==
